effect.en: You may put 2 Energy attached to your opponent's Active Pokémon into their hand.
effect.fr: Vous pouvez ajouter à la main de votre adversaire jusqu'à 2 Énergies attachées à son Pokémon Actif.
effect.es: Puedes poner 2 Energías unidas al Pokémon Activo de tu rival en su mano.
effect.it: Puoi prendere due Energie assegnate al Pokémon attivo del tuo avversario e aggiungerle alle carte che ha in mano.
effect.pt: You may put 2 Energy attached to your opponent's Active Pokémon into their hand.
effect.de: Du kannst deinem Gegner 2 an sein Aktives Pokémon angelegte Energien auf seine Hand geben.

description.en: A smart and kindhearted Pokémon, it glides across the surface of the sea while its beautiful song echoes around it.
